title: I know we shouldn't name and shame
body:
But this, him and Kat were just downright assholes and after losing a 3v2 game told us to kill ourselves.

I am always in favour of shaming others when it comes to this magnitude, it may be "just on the internet" but some people are on edge in real life.

replies.body:
My W/L ratio would be much higher, but this shit happens, AFK, Trolls, feeders.

And do give me any shit about 'learn to play', as you can see, I CAN play.

> [{quoted}](name=akaRaven,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6Wm9UOvO,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-15T06:05:28.148+0000)
> 
> And ***do*** give me any shit about 'learn to play'

Might want to correct that there buddy.
Naming and shaming is acceptable under no circumstances..

I realise that, I also realise Rito needs to do more to stop this from happening. The only way is for the community to stand and have a voice.

If we don't do anything they will think it is all working fine, when it is not.
ADD THE GUY AND SEND SOME FLAME LETS GO MANHUNT!
Erm, no, how about we don't make the matter worse and try to do something to help the community.
this happened to me today and a mate a few weeks ago
why are you so butthurt to name and shame when you WON the game? and lesbihonest nobody who plays league cares anymore about being told to kill themselves

Winning had nothing to do with it, these type of players will flame you regardless if you win or lose, I can guarantee you it would have been a lot worse if we lost, they were getting VERY cocky in game when killed us and than started with the killing yourself comments when they started losing.

i just mean it mightve been more effective if you posted an example of a losing game so you can have more sympathy. i dont care about shittalkers if they hard carry and do there job well, im here to win a game not make friends or prance around in fields of flowers pretending to escape my life problems or whatever
I'm here to win also, but next time I will lose on purpose just to prove you a point shall I?

Those people deserved to be name and shamed don't get butthurt.

It's because Riot tolerates toxic behavior, so it grows like the mold in a public toilet, then Riot hires some neuroscientist instead of looking at problems.
Lol So what if he lost? Those idiots deserve more than name shaming. I know why you are trying to protect those bronzie scrubs. You are one of them obviously. xD
